com.team09.qanda.views

Class QuestionThreadActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        • com.team09.qanda.views.QuestionThreadActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocDialogFragment.LocDialogListener

    public class QuestionThreadActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
implements LocDialogFragment.LocDialogListener
    This activity displays a questionThread. This includes displaying the question and any answers and allows the user to upvote questions and answers or post an answer or a reply.

      • onScreenHelp

        public void onScreenHelp()
        This method opens up the on-Screen Help dialog when called The on-Screen Help dialog contains helpful information regarding the current screen/activity the user is in. The information is stored in the res/layouts directory. This activity's help information is stored in res/layouts/questionactivity_help.xml
        Parameters:
        -

      • userThreadsActivity

        public void userThreadsActivity(java.lang.String FILENAME)
        This method allows navigation to lists of locally saved questions (favourites, my questions and read laters) upon selection from the menu. It starts the UserThreadsActivity to display these lists.
        Parameters:
        FILENAME - The file which saves the questions locally

      • attachImage

        public void attachImage(View v)
        attachImage Calls an Intent to allow user to attach an image. Called when user presses attach button.
